concept.title: AMF support for NSSF Nnssf_NSSelection service load balancing (Feature f20024-10)
concept.shortdesc: This feature allows the AMF to load balance the Nnssf_NSSelection service requests between multiple slice selection services. The AMF load balances the traffic across multiple slice selection services based on the capacity of each service.

conbody.p: When this feature is enabled, the load balancing is applied for the multiple NSSF Nnssf_NSSelection service instances among the highest priority available service instances based on the relative capacity.
